src: "Addaan kami ti 4-a-bulan a babbao a dati ket diabetic ngem saan itan," nainayonna.
mt: "We have a four-month-old baby who was diabetic but is not now," she said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Impalagip ni Dr. Ehud Ur, propesor ti medisina iti Dalhousie University idiay Halifax, Nova Scotia ken daulo ti klinikal ken sientipiko a dibision ti Canadian Diabetes Association a ti panagsukisok ket adda pay laeng kadagiti damdamo nga aldawna.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and head of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, says the search is not over yet.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kas iti dadduma nga eksperto, pagduaduaanna no mabalin a maagasan ti diabetes, napaliiwna a dagitoy a duktal ket awan pakainaiganna kadagiti tattao nga addaanen iti Type 1 a diabetes.
mt: Like other experts, they say that if Type 1 diabetes can be prevented, these doctors may be able to help people who already have it.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Idi Lunes, inwaragawag iti publiko ni Sara Danius, permanente a sekretaria ti Komite iti Nobel para iti Literatura ti Sweden Academy, bayat ti maysa a programa iti Sveriges Radio iti Sweden a saan a direkta a naawagan ti komite ni Bob Dylan maipanggep iti pannangabak daytoy iti 2016 Premio Nobel iti Literatura ti Nobel, ket binaybay-andan ti insayangkatda a maawagan daytoy.
mt: On Monday, the public was informed by Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy Committee for the Nobel Prize in Literature, that the committee had decided to award the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature to Bob Dylan, while a program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden was not directly asked about the committee's decision.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Kinuna ni Danius, “Awan ti ar-aramidenmi ita. Immawagak ken nagpaw-itak iti email iti kaasitgan a kaduana ket nakaawatak iti nasasayaat a sungbat. Ita, umanay daydiayen.”
mt: Danius said, “I don’t know what to say. I was shocked and I sent an email to the person who was in charge of the account and he was very helpful. I, in fact, was very happy.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Iti napalabas, imbaga ti CEO ti Ring, a ni Jamie Siminoff, a nangrugi iti kompania idi saan a mangngeg ti doorbellna idiay garahena.
mt: In the past, the CEO of Ring, Jamie Siminoff, said the company started in his garage before he installed a doorbell.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Nagaramid isuna ti WiFi a doorbell, kinunana.
mt: It also makes a WiFi doorbell, claimed.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Kinuna ni Siminoff nga iti naglakwanda ket pimmigsa kalpasan ti panagparangna idi 2013 idiay pabuya a Tangke ti Pating no sadinno a dagiti hurado ti pabuya ket saanda pinondoan ti negosio.
mt: Siminoff said the company was forced to close after the 2013 fire at the Pating warehouse, which was not insured by the business.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Idi arinunos ti 2017, nagparang ni Siminoff iti paglakuan nga istasion ti telebision a QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Nakiareglo ti Ring iti maysa nga asunto ti kalabanna a kompania ti seguridad, ti ADT Corporation.
mt: The Ring was sued by ADT Corporation, a security company.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Idinto a maysa nga eksperimental a bakuna ti agparparang a mabalin a makakissay iti mortalidad ti Ebola, agingga ita, awan pay dagiti droga a nalawag a mangipaneknek iti kinaepektiboda a makaagas kadagiti agdama nga impeksion.
mt: A new experimental vaccine is being tested to prevent mortality from Ebola, and it is not yet clear if any drugs are effective in treating current infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Iti maysa a mainom nga antibody, Zmapp, idi un-unana ket nangipakita iti kinamayatna, ngem dagiti pormal a panagadal ket mangibaga nga iti daytoy ket addaan ti basbassit a benepisio a sapsapulenda iti panangprebentar ti patay.
mt: In an early trial of an experimental antibody, Zmapp, patients showed improvement, but formal studies show that it has little benefit in treating death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Iti pannubok ti PALM, nagserbi a kontrol ti Zmapp, kayatna sawen nga inusar dagiti sientista daytoy a kas pagibasaran ket inkomparada ti tallo pay a sabali a panangagas iti daytoy.
mt: In the PALM trial, Zmapp was used as a control, as the scientists wanted to compare it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Suportaan ti USA Gymnastics ti surat ti Komite para iti Olympics ti Estados Unidos ken awatenna iti talaga a kasapulan a pamilya ti Olympics tapno ipakitada iti natalged nga aglawlaw para kadagiti amin nga atleta.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and acknowledges the genuine concern of Olympic families to ensure that all athletes are treated fairly.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Umannugottayo iti waragawag ti USOC a dagiti interes dagiti atletatayo ken dagiti club, ken dagiti isportda, ket mabalin a mas maserbian babaen ti iyaaddang nga addaan iti panagbalbaliw iti uneg ti organisasiontayo, a saan ket a panangikkat iti sertipikasion.
mt: The USOC said the interests of its athletes and clubs, and its sports federations, could be better served by its own internal restructuring, rather than by a merger with the federation.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Suportaran ti USA Gymnastics ti independiente nga imbestigasion a mabalin a manglawag no kasano a ti panagabuso a ti kinakarona ket situtured nga inladawan dagiti nakalasat ken ni Larry Nassar ket nakabaybayag a saan a naduktalan, ket sisasagana iti ania man a masapul ken mainugot a panagbalbaliw.
mt: USA Gymnastics will support an independent investigation that could determine how abuse allegations against Nassar were mishandled and whether the organization did enough to prevent and respond to abuse, and will provide any and all requested documents and witnesses.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Addaan iti agpada a panggep ti USA Gymnastics ken ti USOC — ti mamagbalin iti isport a gymnastics, ken dadduma pay, a natalged para kadagiti atleta tapno magun-odda ti arapaapda iti natalged, positibo ken napabileg nga aglawlaw.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC — the governing body of gymnastics, among other sports, that was responsible for the athletes' care, safety, well-being, and health — were found to have failed to protect the athletes from abuse, neglect, and exploitation.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Iti unos ti 1960s, nagobra ni Brzenzinski a kas mammagbaga ni John F. Kennedy ken kalpasanna iti administrasion ni Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Kabayatan ti panagpipili idi 1976 kinaduana ni Carter iti polisiya ti ruar, santo nagserbi a kas Advisor ti Nasional a Seguridad (NSA) nangrugi ti 1977 agingga ti 1981, simmaruno ken ni Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, Carter chose the policy of détente, serving as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 until 1981, succeeded by Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Kas NSA, tinulunganna ni Carter a diplomatiko a mangasikaso kadagiti aramid ti lubong, kas ti Camp David Accords, 198; panagnormalisa iti relasion ti US-Tsina idi maudi a dekada ti 1970s; iti Robolusion idiay Iran, a nangidaulo ti krisis ti pannakautibo idiay Iran, 1979; ken iti panagdarup ti Soviet idiay Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: As NSA, Carter helped to broker world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 198; normalization of US-China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution which led to the hostage crisis in Iran, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Ti pelikula, a pagbidaan da Ryan Gosling ken Emma Stone, ket nakaawat iti nominasion iti amin a dadakkel a kategoria.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for all major awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Nakaawat da Gosling ken Stone iti nominasion para iti Kalalaingan nga Aktor ken Aktres, kas panagsaganadda.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress, respectively, as expected.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Dagiti dadduma pay a nominasion ket pakairamanan ti Kapintasan a Pelikula, Kalaingan a Direktor, Kasayaatan a Cinematography, Disenio ti Kawes, Panagedit iti Pelikula, Orihinal nga Score, Disenio ti Produksion, Panagedit iti Uni, Panaglalaok iti Uni ken Orihinal nga Screenplay.
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Art Direction, Best Editing, Best Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dua a kanta a naggapu iti pelikula, ti Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ken ti City of Stars, ti nakaawat iti nominasion para iti kapintasan nga orihinal a kanta. Nakaawat ti studio ti Lionsgate  iti 26 a nominasion - ad-adu ngem iti ania man a sabali nga studio.
mt: Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. The studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Idi rabii ti Domingo, ti Presidente ti Estados Unidos a ni Donald Trump, iti saona a naiyebkasna babaen ti press secretary, ket imbagana a dagiti buyot ti Estados Unidos ket pumanawen iti Syria.
mt: On Sunday, President of the United States Donald Trump, in a statement released by his press secretary, announced that US troops were leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Iti pakaammo ket naaramid idi malpas ni Trump a nakipatang iti telepono ken ni Presidente ti Turkia Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: Trump was informed of the call by Erdogan after the meeting.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Ti Turkey ket mangsublat a mangbantay kadagidiay natiliw a mannakilaban nga ISIS , kuna iti naibaga, dagiti nasion ti Europa ket inlaksidda a pagawiden.
mt: Turkey is leading the fight against ISIS, said the statement, but European nations are dragging their feet.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Saan laeng a paneknekan daytoy a sumagmamano kadagiti dinosaur ket addaan dutdot, nakawarasen ti maysa a teoria, ngem mangted pay daytoy kadagiti detalye a kaaduanna a di maited dagiti fossil, kas koma iti maris wenno tallo a dimension nga urnos.
mt: This is not the first time that a theory has been disproved, but this one also disproves the details of the theory, such as the three-dimensional structure.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Ibaga dagiti sientista a ti dutdot daytoy nga ayup ket maradaga a kas kastanias ti ngato nga adda ti nakusnaw wenno kakulay ti carotenoid ti tianna.
mt: . Scientists say the fruit of this bird is similar to chestnuts and contains carotenoids.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Ti naduktalanda ket mangted met iti pagpampanunotan iti panagbaliw dagiti dutdot kadagiti billit.
mt: The damage also caused the runway lights to go out.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Gapu ta dagiti dutdot ti dinosaur ket saan a naaramid a nalaing ti ungkayna, a maawagan iti rachis, ngem addaan iti sabsabali pay a langana a kas dutdot — rungo ken babassit a saw-it — impasimudaag dagiti agsuksukisok ga dagiti ungkay ket mabalin a maud-udi a pannakapasayaat ti ebolusion a kas iparangarang dagitoy.
mt: Because the dinosaur's fronds were not made of the same material as the stem, which is called the rachis, but also had other structures such as the petiole and small leaflets, the evolution of the fronds could be improved by the searchers.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Isingsingasing ti istruktura ti dutdot a saan a mausar dagitoy iti panagtayab ngem ketdi para iti pannakatimbeng ti temperatura wneno kas maiparang. Insingasing dagiti agsuksukisok nga uray no ipus daytoy ti maysa a naubing a dinosaur, ipakita ti sampol ti dutdot ti nataengan a saan ket nga iti piek.
mt: The structure is not intended to be used for sitting but rather for temperature regulation and to show that the fossilized remains of a dinosaur are not a piecemeal.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Insingasing dagiti manangsarsarak nga, uray pay a daytoy ket ipos ti ubing a dinosaur, ti pagwadan ket mangipakita iti nataengan a baba saan nga iti baba ti piyek.
mt: Scientists say, even though this is a juvenile dinosaur, the bite marks show that it was prey.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bimtak ti lugan a bomba ti ulo a pagtaengan ti pulisia idiay Gaziantep, Turkey idi kalman ti bigat a nangpapatay iti dua nga opisial ti polis ken nangsugat iti nasurok duapulo a tattao.
mt: A police bomb squad detonated a bomb in a residential area of Gaziantep, Turkey on Saturday, killing two police officers and injuring about 50 people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Imbaga ti opisina ti gobernador a sangapulo ket siyam kadagiti nadangran ket opisial ti polis.
mt: 9 of the 10 injured were police officials.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Imbaga dagiti polis a pagsuspetsaanda ti maysa a napabasol a militante a Daesh (ISIL) a responsable iti atake.
mt: Police suspect a lone Daesh (ISIL) militant was responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Naammuanda nga ket agtigtignay ti Init a kapada dagiti kangrunaan a prinsipio a kas iti dadduma a bituen: Naammuan a ti aktibidad ti amin a bituen iti sistema ket paggarawen ti kinaraniagda, panagrikusda, ken awanen sabali pay.
mt: It is believed that the activity of all stars in the system is responsible for the illumination, heating, and absence of others.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Musar nga agpada ti panagrikus ken kinaraniag tapno maammuan ti Rossby a numero ti maysa a bituen, a mainaig iti agus ti plasma.
mt: It is hoped that the study will help to understand the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the rate of plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: No basbassit ti numero ti Rossby, saan unay nga aktibo ti bituen no maipanggep kadagiti magnetic reversal.
mt: With a low Rossby number, the sun is not very active in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Kabayatan ti panagbiahena, namin-adu a naipasango ni Iwasaki iti problema.
mt: In his statement, Iwasaki admitted that he had been aware of the problem for some time.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Tinakawan isuna dagiti pirata, kinagat ti aguuyong nga aso idiay Tibet, nanglibas iti kasarna idiay Nepal ken natiliw idiay India.
mt: It was captured by pirates, bitten by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped from prison in Nepal and was released in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Agandar ti 802.11n standard iti agpada a 2.4Ghz ken 5.0Ghz a frequency.
mt: 802.11n standard operates at the same 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Palubosan daytoy a paatras a maibagay iti 802.11a, 802.11b ken 802.11g, basta la ketdi addaan dua a radio ti base station.
mt: This is a backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, but it has two radios in the base station.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Adayo a napaspaspas dagiti pegges ti 802.11n ngem kadagiti immun-una iti daytoy nga addaan iti kangatuan a mapattapatta a kapaspas a 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n devices are faster than previous ones, but not as fast as the theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Ni Duvall, a sikakasar ken addaan iti dua nga annak a nataengan, ket saan a nakaibati ti dakkel nga impresion ken ni Miller, nga isu ti nakainaigan ti istoria.
mt: Duvall, who has two children living with her, said she was not aware of the large impression Miller made on history.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Idi saludsodenda no ania ti makunana, imbaga ni Miller, “Adu la unay ti sawsawen ni Mike bayat ti bista…  agsagsaganaak idi isu a saanko unay a nangngegan ti  imbagbagana.”
mt: When asked what he was doing, Miller said, “Mike’s been working hard all day…  I just wanted to get in on the action.”
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Ikarigatanmi a kissayan ti emision ti carbon dioxide kada bilang ti GDP ti dakkel a baet babaen ti level idi 2020 gapu idi 2005”, kuna ni Hu.
mt: “I will reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a large margin compared to the level in 2020 since 2005,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Saanna nga inkeddeng no kasano ti kaadu ti makissay, ibagbagana laeng nga agpannuray iti mapataud ti ekonomia ti China.
mt: Before you ask how much is enough, just know that China's economy is growing.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Inawis ni Hu dagiti dumadakkel a pagilian a “lisian ti daan nga aramid nga agrugit umuna sakbay agdalus.”
mt: Hu said the world's largest nations should "lead the way in reducing emissions before they get out of control."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Innayonna a “saan nga idawat kaniada a mangala ti obligasion a lumampas ti lebel ti panagdakkelda, responsibilidad, ken kabaelan”
mt: It was announced that “no one has been found to assume the obligation to exceed the level of accountability, responsibility, and entitlement”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Inpresentar ti Grupo ti Panagadal ti Iraq ti reportna iti 12.00 GMT ita nga aldaw.
mt: The Iraqi Group of Experts presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Impakdaarna nga Awan iti makasigurado nga aniaman iti aramiden idiay Iraq iti daytoy a kanito ket mangpasardeng iti gubat, panagraira iti kinabayolente, wenno iti papan iti riribok.
mt: It is not yet known what the U.S. military is doing in Iraq at this time, but it is likely to be related to the war, the occupation, or the reconstruction.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Nangrugi ti Report nga adda ti pangaasi iti nawaya a debate ken ti panagaramid ti concensus ti Estados Unidos panggep kadagiti paglintegan para iti Tengnga a Daya.
mt: Negotiations to begin on a free trade agreement and consensus on U.S. terms for the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Kritikal la unay ti report iti dandani amin nga aspekto ti agdama a polisia ti Ehekutibo maipanggep iti Iraq ket ipaganetgetna ti madagdagus a pannakabalbaliw ti direksion.
mt: The report is critical of all aspects of the current Iraqi government's police force, which has been accused of a sharp increase in direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Iti umuna kadagiti 78 a rekomendasionna ket ti maysa a baro a diplomatiko nga inisiatibo ket masapul a maaramid sakbay iti udi daytoy a tawen tapno masalakniban ti border ti Iraq kontra kadagiti naranggas nga ibaballaet ken tapno maipatakder manen ti diplomatiko a relasionna kadagiti karrubana.
mt: 1 of the 78 recommendations was a new diplomatic initiative to be completed before the end of this year to secure the border of Iraq against terrorist infiltration and to reestablish diplomatic relations with the neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ti agdama a senador ken First Lady ti Argentina a ni Cristina Fernandez de Kircher inyanunsiona idi kalman iti rabii ti panagkandidatona kas presidente idiay La Plata, maysa nga ili a 50 a kilometro (31 milia) manipud Buenos Aires.
mt: Argentina's current senator and First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president on Friday in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Impakaammo ni Mrs. Kircher ti intensionna a tumaray para ti pagkapresidente idiay Argentene Theathre, iti pareho nga lokasion nga inusarna idi rugianna iti kampanyana idi 2005 para iti Senado kas miembro iti delegasion ti probinsia iti Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kircher announced her intention to run for president at the Argentene Theatre, the same location where she campaigned in 2005 for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Napasgedan ti debate gapu iti kontrobersia maipanggep iti pannakagastos ti ayuda ken rekonstruksion idi kalkalpas ti bagyo a Katrina; a nagaangawan nga inawagan ti sumagmamano a konserbatibo a piskal iti “Bush's New Orleans Deal.”
mt: The debate was overshadowed by controversy over the cost of aid and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; many conservatives called Bush's New Orleans Deal.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Ti naruay a kritisismo bayat ti panangtarimaan ket nakaiturong iti ayan ti pannakaiyawat ti kontrata ti panangtarimaan kadagiti taga-uneg iti Washington.
mt: The criticism of the contract while it was being awarded led to the cancellation of the contract with the Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Nasurok nga uppat a milion a tattao ti napan idiay Roma tapno tumabuno ti lamay.
mt: 4 million people attended the event in Rome to celebrate the day.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Ti bilang dagiti tattao a timmabuno ket nagdakkel isu a saan a maikkan amin ti waya a mapan ti tabon idiay St. Peter's Square.
mt: The number of people attending the event grew, but not all were able to fit into St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Sumagmamano a dadakkel ti iskrinna a telebision ti naipuesto iti nadumaduma a paset ti Roma tapno makabuya dagiti tattao iti seremonia.
mt: A large screen television was placed in several parts of Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Iti sabsabali pay a siudad iti Italia ken iti nga lubong, aglalo iti Poland, naaramid dagiti isu met la a setup, a binuya ti adu a tao.
mt: In other cities in Italy and around the world, including Poland, similar setups were destroyed, killing many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Dinillaw dagiti historiador dagiti naudi nga annuroten ti FBI a mangipangpangruna kadagiti rekursosda kadagiti kaso a nalaka a masolbar, nangruna kadagiti kaso ti natakaw a luglugan, a ti intensionna ket mapangato ti kaadu ti panagballigi ti ahensia.
mt: Historians say the FBI's recent release of documents related to its Cold War-era surveillance of civil rights leaders, among others, was aimed at clearing up the agency's record, particularly in cases of stolen documents, whose intent was to show the agency's effectiveness.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Inrugi nga ikkan ti pondo ti Kongreso ti inisiatibo para ti kinaalas idiay piskal idi 2005 ken espesipiko nga imbagada a masapul a mangted ti FBI ti 10 nga ahentena para ti pornograpiya kadagiti nataengan.
mt: 2005 legislation to fund the initiative in the budget and specifically directed the FBI to hire 10 agents for pornography in the homes.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Nakaaramid ti kangatuan a puntos ni Robin Uthappa, 70 a taray ti 41 laeng a bola bayat ti panangtirana ti 11 nga uppat ken 2 nga innem.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa, who scored 41 runs off 11 balls and 2 sixes, made the highest score.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Dagiti makentengnga nga urnos a batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar ken Rahul Dravid, ket nasayaat ti naubrada ken nakaaramid ti gasot a panagtaray a panagkapareha.
mt: The top-order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, were well set for a record partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Ngem, kalpasan a maabakda iti captain's wicket, nakaaramid laeng ti India iti 36 a run a nakaabakanna iti 7 a wicket tapno mapalpasna dagiti inning.
mt: But after the captain's wicket fell, India could only score 36 runs in 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Simmangpet iti Singapore ni U.S. President George W. Bush iti agsapa ti Nobiembre 16, a panangrugina iti makalawas a panagbisitana iti Asia.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush met with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong on November 16, as part of his first visit to Asia since his re-election.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Kinablaawan isuna ti Deputy Prime Minister ti Singapore a ni Wong Kan Seng ket nagpatanganda dagiti bambanag maipapan ti panagnegosio ken terorismo a kaduada ti Prime Minister ti Singapore a ni Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was also Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore, who was appointed by Prime Minister of Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Kalpasan ti makadominggo a pannakaabak ti kagudua a termino nga eleksion, imbaga ni Bush kadagiti agbuybuya ti panangpalawa ti negosio idiay Asia.
mt: After the successful reelection bid, Bush told business leaders in Asia that the U.S. would continue to push for free trade.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Immanamong ni Prime Minister Stephen Harper a maipatulod ti “Clean Air Act” ti gobierno tapno mapagadalan ti maysa nga amin-a-partido a komite sakbay ti maikadua a pannakabasa daytoy, kalpasan ti 25 a minuto a panagpatangda iti lider ti NDP a ni Jack Layton idi Martes iti PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper said the "Clean Air Act" will be sent to a multi-party committee for review before it is read a second time, after NDP leader Jack Layton's 25-minute filibuster at the PMO on Tuesday.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Indawat ni Layton ti pannakabalbaliw iti gakat dagiti konserbatibo para iti aglawlaw kabayatan ti pannakitaripnong iti PM, a dumawdawat iti “maminpinsan ken kompleto a pannakabaliw ti pannakaisurat” ti gakat para iti aglawlaw ti partido a Konserbatibo.
mt: Layton received a backlash from conservatives for his support of the PM's "radical and complete rewriting" of the party's platform.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Sipud nangrugi ti pederal a gobierno ket immaddang tapno mangkontrol ti panagpondo ti ospital iti Mersey idiay Devonport, Tasmania, ti gobierno ti estado ken dadduma a pederal nga MP ket binabalawda dayta nga aramid a kas pannakipabuya para iti pangrugian ti eleksion ti pederal a maaramid inton Nobiembre.
mt: Because the federal government began to control the hospital in Mersey, Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and other federal MPs criticized this action as a pre-election stunt.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Ngem imbaga ti Prime Minister a ni Joh Howard a ti linteg ket para laeng masalakniban dagiti pasilidad ti ospital kontra iti pannakaibaba ti gradoda ti Gobierno ti Tasmania, ket nangted ti nayun a AUD$45 milion.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the deal was only to protect hospital facilities from a drop in government funding in Tasmania, and offered the town AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Kuna iti kabaruan a padamag, ti basa iti pantar ti baybay ket mangibaga a naaramid ti tsunami. Adda ti dadduma a napasamak a tsunami a nairekord it asideg iti Pago Pago ken Niue.
mt: In the latest report, the wave height in the lagoon is reported to be 1.5 meters. Other tsunamis were recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Awan iti dakkel a dadael wenno dagiti nadangran a naipadamag idiay Tonga, ngem temporario a nagpukaw ti elektrisidad, a naipadamag a nanglapped kadagiti autoridad ti Tonga a makaawat iti pakdaar ti tsunami nga inruar ti PTWC.
mt: There were no major damage or injuries in Tonga, but temporary power outages occurred, which authorities in Tonga said were due to the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Sangapulo-ket-uppat a pagadalan iti Hawaii nga adda wenno asideg iti baybay ti nakaserra pay laeng iti Mierkoles uray pay no naikkaten dagiti pakdaar.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii that are near or on the coast were also damaged by the tsunami on Wednesday, even though they were evacuated.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Inakseptar ni George W. Bush a Presidente ti U.S. dayta a pakaammo.
mt: President George W. Bush accepted this information.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Ti parasarita ni Bush a ni Gordon Johndroe, inawaganna ti kari ti North Korea a “maysa a dakkel nga addang nga agturong iti panggep a pannakaragpat iti  mapaneknekan a pannakaikkat ti nuklear iti peninsula a Korea.”
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's claim that it has nuclear weapons "a serious provocation to the region and the world."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Ti maika-sangapulo a nainaganan a bagyo ti panawen ti Panagbabagyo ti Atlantiko, Subrtropikal a Bagyo Jerry, nagparang ti Baybay Atlantiko ita nga aldaw.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Ibagbaga ti National Hurricane Center (NHC) nga itatta nga oras awan ti peggad a maited ni Jerry ditoy daga.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said at that time there was no landfall expected for Jerry in the U.S.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Inistima ti U.S. Corps of Engineers nga 6 a pulgada ti tudo ti mabalin a manggiwang iti dati a nadadaelen a tambak.
mt: 6 inches of rain could flood the former landfill.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ti Ninth a Ward, a nalayus iti agingga iti kangato a 20 kadapan kabayatan ti Hurricane Katrina, ket madama a pagatsiket ti danumna ta naglupias ti levee nga adda iti asideg.
mt: 9th Ward, which was flooded to a depth of 20 feet above ground by Hurricane Katrina, is still recovering from the water damage as the levee that was nearby breached.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Agleplepias ti danum idiay tambak nga addaan seksion a 100 kadapan ti lawana.
mt: 100 feet of pipe was ruptured.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Iti Administrador ti Commons a ni Adam Cuerden ket nangiebkas iti pannakaupayna kadagiti panangikkat idi nagsao isuna iti Wikinews idi naudi a bulan.
mt: In Wikimedia Commons administrator Adam Cuerden has been credited with improving the article's image quality after he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Rugrugi pay lang, agul-ulboden [ni Wales] kadatayo. Umuna, babaen ti panangipakitana a legal a rason daytoy. Maikadua, babaen ti panagpammarangna a dengdenggennatayo, agingga a naikkat ti inaramidna nga art.
mt: "It's still early, [Wales] is still in the process of building [a case]. First, by showing a legal reason for it. Second, by showing that you are not satisfied with what has been done."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Gapu ta adu ti masuron a tattao, adda panangikagumaan a mangpanday iti linteg maipapan iti sexual a linaon ti site a mangho-host iti minilion a lisensiado a media.
mt: Because of the large number of people, there is concern about the safety of the fence to the site hosting the million licensed media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Kaaduanna a pattapatta ti naaramid nga obra, ngem ti naisurat ti programa tapno matulad dagiti naiwayat nga obserbasion iti galaxy ti Sagittarius.
mt: The team also found that the observed structure of the galaxy matches the predictions of the program.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ti epekto a sapsapulen ti grupo ket ti makaigapu kadagiti puersa ti gravity iti nabaetan ti dark matter ti galaxy ken ti dark matter ti Milky Way.
mt: The effect of the group is to pull the gravity of the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Kas iti panangguyod ti bulan iti Daga, a mangigapu iti panagatab ken panagugot ti danum ti baybay, kasta met ti Milky Way iti panangguyodna iti galaxy ti Sagittarius.
mt: As the Moon orbits the Earth, it is sometimes seen to pass in front of the Sun, blocking its light and causing an eclipse. Similarly, the Milky Way orbits the galaxy of Sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Nabalinan dagiti sientista nga inkeddeng a ti dark matter ket apektaranna ti dadduma pay a dark matter iti isu met la a wagas a kas iti regular a matter.
mt: Scientists say the dark matter may affect other dark matter as well as regular matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Ibaga daytoy a teoria nga adu kadagiti dark matter nga aglawlaw iti galaxy ket mabirukan aglawlaw iti galaxy a kasla halo, ket naaramid ti adu a babassit a partikulo.
mt: This theory that most of the dark matter in a galaxy is distributed in a halo around the galaxy was made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Impakita dagiti report iti telebision ti puraw nga asuk nga aggapu iti planta.
mt: Reports on television showed a white cloud of smoke billowing from the plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Dagiti lokal nga autoridad ket nagpakdaar kadagiti residente iti aglawlaw ti planta nga agtalinaedda ti uneg ti balayda, iddependa dagiti airconda, ken saanda nga uminom iti danum ti gripo.
mt: Local authorities have ordered residents living near the plant to stay indoors, close their windows and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Manipud ti nuklear nga ahensia ti Japan, dagiti radioactive casesium ken iodine ket nailasin idiay planta
mt: From the nuclear agency of Japan, radioactive cesium and iodine were detected at the plant
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Pattapattaen dagiti agturay a daytoy ket mangipakita a dagiti pagianan ti uranium fuel idiay lugar ket mabalin bemmtak ken naglepias.
mt: Officials say the incident shows that the uranium fuel storage facilities in the area are vulnerable to fire and explosion.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Nadiskobre ni Dr. Tony Moll ti Extremely Drug Resisant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) iti rehion a KwaZulu-Natal iti Abagatan nga Africa.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ti maysa nga interbiu, kinunana a ti klasena ket “nakabutbuteng ken makapadanag gapu ti nakangatngato a bilang ti patayenna.”
mt: An interviewee said the breed was "aggressive and dangerous because of the high number of attacks."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Pampanunoten ni Dr. Moll a mabalin nga iti ospital ti nakaimpektaran ti dadduma a pasiente iti dayta a bacteria, ken kasta met ti napasamak iti dua ken ad-adu pay nga agtrabtrabaho iti ospital.
mt: Dr. Moll said it is possible that the hospital may have infected other patients with the bacteria, as happened at two and possibly more hospitals.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
